description: Variation of Condition Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 24/01957/HOU (Demolition of rear garage and front porch and erection of single storey side and rear wraparound extension and front porch) to increase the size of front porch.
decision_conditions: The proposed amendments to Condition 1 (Approved Plans ) of Planning Permission 24/01957/HOU would  materially diminish the quality of the approved development causing harm to the character and appearance of the host dwelling . The proposal is considered to be contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan, 2021, Policies CS8 and DM10 of the RBK Core Strategy and Policy Guidance 38 in the Residential Design SPD (2013).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
